name: Dea Tenebrarum
overview: That night doom loomed over the castle. Satan had returned to his beloved: he had entered her body, trying to bend her soul. In normal conditions, getting rid of him would not have been difficult; but unfortunately for our lady, it was the night of the witches, moment of maximum satanic power ... Thanks to a powerful spell he managed to plunge the evil entity into a deep sleep, without achieving the necessary exorcism to remove it from his body and end the possession. The Goddess knew that at 12 o'clock; the one who was once her lover and her teacher, would awaken a thousand times stronger than ever, more powerful. Evil would take her away again! Meanwhile, Father Allicrom, an expert exorcist, who had become famous for the kind Lady of the castle, decided to pay her a visit, a whim of her destiny, just that same day. The cleric, through a secret entrance at the top of an adjoining hill, as indicated by the friends of the Goddess, entered the battlements of the castle. Suddenly a hideous winged creature pounced on him, pinning him against a wall. What was that monster? What was he doing in the castle? Was the Lady in danger? The priest was puzzled, only an idea hammered his mind: "Get to her, whatever it takes!"
